attributes.action: Stop the use of young girls in adult material on the internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am confused that such people allow young girls to be filmed or photographed in this way i have stumbled across numerous pis/vids which have featured young girl no older than eight years old!! this has to stop!! As an adult i find it dicusting to come across an eight year old when looking for adult material on the internet

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
